body.p:
Paducah Ky
Aug. 24th 1862
Gov. Jas. F Robinson
Frankfort, Ky.
Sir.
I would most respectfully recommend Dr. A de Lazynski as a proper person for the position of examining Surgeon in the Draft of the Militia in this county, recently ordered by the Federal Government
As to qualifications, both, as a man of eminent position in his profession, and as an ardent loyal, Union citizen, there is no one his superior in the county.
Hoping you will give to Dr. L's. claims a favorable consideration,

I have the honor to be,
Very Respectfully
Your Obt. Serv.
R. B. Twyman

P.S. I should have stated that
Dr. Lazynski was recently acting Senior Assistant Surgeon, in the 6th Illinois Cavalry, which position he was forced to resign on account of ill health.
